title: Contemporary Duplex Haven in Zatorze
description: Step into this stylish and modern duplex boasting 4 spacious bedrooms and 2 well-appointed bathrooms, offering 145 sqm of thoughtfully designed living space. Expansive balconies draw in natural light, while the private fenced yard and automatic gate ensure peace of mind. The open-concept kitchen and living area create a perfect space for work and relaxation, blending comfort with practicality for today's dynamic lifestyles.
neighborhood_description: Zatorze is renowned for its blend of green surroundings and family-friendly atmosphere, offering a balance of quiet living and community activity. Spend weekends exploring local parks, cafés, or the nearby bike trails. Public transport and easy access to the highway make commuting a breeze whether you head into the city or out for weekend adventures.
lifestyle_benefits: high walkability to cafés and parks
target_buyer: Perfect for young professionals, remote-working couples, or digital nomads seeking more space and a vibrant local community within easy reach of major transport links.
market_positioning: Rarely does a duplex of this scale, polish, and price emerge in Zatorze. With designer finishes, smart security, wellness amenities, and a premium neighborhood vibe, it stands apart as the go-to choice for tech-savvy urban movers and creative lifestyle seekers in Leszno.”
